About Me

BIO

Introduction

I an a college graduate at Medgar Ever College with a degree in Computer Information System I have experience with front End and back End coding as well as strategic planning and techinal writting I also part of the Honor Society. When am not building projects I like to watch netflilx shows, and listen to some of my favorite podcasts. You can check out some of my projects and I am looking forward to connecting with you.

Eperience

Full Stack Developer

Some experience I have as an Computer Programmer would be working as a student Intern at Medgar Ever College and Bronx Community College, my day to day task would include working on exsisting website, updating the website, uploading software to the computers, also setting up meetings and working as a team with other students.
